II.iii.4.B.2.g
.
Identifying Original Claims Submitted Using the Checkmark Solution
To identify claims submitted using the checkmark solution, open the
VA Form 21-526EZ
to page 10 and verify the
VETERAN/SERVICE MEMBER/ALTERNATE SIGNER SIGNATURE block of Section V contains an “X” followed by the claimant’s typed name, and
the SIGNATURE OF WITNESS block of Section VI contains the electronic signature of a POA with an OGC designated code number.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section B - Stakeholder Enterprise Portal (SEP) Claims
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section B
